p: We investigated the differential expression of HERV-W E1 and HERV-FRD 1 in colon adenocarcinoma based on the cell line HCT8 WT/RETO. During development of resistance against etoposide, the first observable change was the emergence of a transitory cell hypertrophy as depicted in Fig.Â 2, together with the overexpression of several endoretroviral elements as observed by ICC.
